content:
The boy who played. 
 Anet Ssebagala 
 English 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Aunt Merane gave some money to 
 
 Joe.Go Go to the shop. Buy sugar and 
 
 bread. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Joe picked an old car Tyre. 
 
 He ran fast with to the 
 
 shop. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Before reaching the 
 
 shop,he saw the bal. 
 
 
 
 He forgot the tyre. 
 
 He picked the bal and 
 
 kicked it. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He saw a flying bird. 
 
 He wanted to catch it. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He saw the cows. 
 
 He stoped and started 
 
 singing to them. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "Where is Joe? Asked 
 
 Jesica” 
 
 “He is just late but he is 
 
 coming.” Aunt Merane said. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Uncle Don sat with baby 
 
 Tara. 
 
 He wanted to have 
 
 breakfast before going for 
 
 work. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Joe saw a pupy. He ran 
 
 with it around the fields. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He got tired. 
 
 He sat down and checked 
 
 his pocket. 
 
 The money was not there. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He ran home without sugar 
 
 and bread. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "Joe, Where is sugar and bread? 
 
 Where is the money?' 
 
 Asked Aunt Merane. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Am very sory Aunt Merane. 
 
 I played to much and lost the money. 
 
 
 12
